hero.title: I ka sigi Espanyi, <1>sariya koɲɛw</1> tɛ tɔɔrɔ ye
hero.subtitle: Sariya ni lakali labɛn
hero.desc: IA dɛmɛn fɔlɔ bɛɛ kora mɔgɔ kɔkanw ye. I ka jamana kɔnɔ sigi sɛbɛw ni sariya koɲɛw bɛɛ labɛn ni hakili duman ye.

features.title: Mun na LegalFlow?
features.subtitle: A dilala tɔnw ni jaabi dɛmɛnbagaw ye.
features.security_desc: I ka tɔn bɛ lakatali kɔnɔ.
features.ai_desc: An ka IA bɛ sɛbɛw kɔnɔ koɲɛw faamu.
features.global_desc: Espanyi, Maroku ni LATAM baarakɛlaw ye.

pricing.title: Poranw ni sɔngɔw
pricing.subtitle: I ka baara bonya ni <1>IA sariya</1> ye
pricing.desc: I ka tɔn poran ɲuman ɲini.

free.name: Starter
free.desc: Mɔgɔ kelen kelen ni dɛmɛnbagaw ye.

pro.name: Business
pro.desc: Tɔnw ni jaabiw n’u bɛ teliya n’u dɛmɛn ɲini.

business.name: Enterprise
business.desc: Tɔnbaaw n’u bɛ dossier caman mara.

cta.title: I ka baara kɛ ni <1>IA sariya</1> ye
cta.desc: Mɔgɔ caman bɛ dɛmɛn sɔrɔ LegalFlow fɛ.

common.query_contact: Ni ɲininka b’i fɛ nin sɛbɛ kan, an sɔrɔ nin kan: {{email}}

legal.privacy_intro: LegalFlow fɛ, an b’i ka kunnafoniw mara kosɛbɛ. Nin sariya in b’a ɲɛfɔ an b’i ka kɔnɔna kunnafoniw sɔrɔ, k’a baara ani k’a lakana cogo min na.
legal.cookies_intro: Nin sariya in b’a ɲɛfɔ an bɛ kukiw ni baarakɛlan gansanw baara cogo min na legalflow.digital kan.
legal.legal_intro: Nin sɛbɛ in bɛ baarakɛcogo sariyaw bɛɛ fɔ legalflow.digital kan.

privacy_content.title: 1. Kunnafoni mara kuntigi
privacy_content.body: LegalFlow Technologies, S.L. (o bɛ wele ko "LegalFlow") min sigiyoro bɛ Madrid, Espanyi. Sɔrɔcogo: privacidad@legalflow.digital.

privacy_content.title: 2. Kunnafoni minnu bɛ sɔrɔ
privacy_content.body: An b’i tɔgɔ, i ka imɛli, i ka sigida, i ka sɛbɛw ani wari ko kunnafoniw mara cogo lakana len na Stripe fɛ.

privacy_content.title: 3. Baara fɛnsɛmɛ
privacy_content.body: I ka kunnafoniw bɛ baara k’i dɛmɛ sariya ko la ni IA ye, i ka kɔnt mara, ani k’an ka baara diyanya.

privacy_content.title: 4. Sariya koro
privacy_content.body: Nin baara in bɛ sariyatigiya kɔnɔ (RGPD sariya 6.1.b), i sɔnnin kɔfɛ i ka sɛbɛw lakaari ma.

privacy_content.title: 5. Iron Silo™ baarakɛlan
privacy_content.body: Sɛbɛw bɛɛ bɛ dogo ni Iron Silo™ ye. Kunnafoniw bɛ mara UE (Europe) masiniw kɔnɔ.

hero.title: I ka LegalFlow dɛmɛnan Espanyi
hero.subtitle: Dɛmɛn tɔn fɛ taw ni tunga la mɔgɔw fɛ. Masini hakili (IA) min dege len don Espanyi sariyaw la.
hero.search_placeholder: I ka ɲininka sɛbɛ yan (misali: NIE ko)...
hero.social_proof: Denbaya 1,200 ni kɔ bɛ an lafiya
hero.verification_badge: Sariya ni lakali dɛmɛn kɔlɔsi len

docs.title: Ne ka sɛbɛw
docs.subtitle: I ka sɛbɛw mara masini hakili (IA) dɛmɛnan ye.
docs.status_processing: IA b’i ka sɛbɛ lakaari kanga...
docs.privacy_notice: I ka sɛbɛw bɛ mara cogo lakana len na.

chat.greeting: I ni ce, ne ye i ka dɛmɛnan ye. N bɛ se ka dɛmɛ kɛ i ye cogo di bi?
chat.online_status: A bɛ baara la • Kɔlɔsi len don
chat.ai_disclaimer: IA bɛ se ka fili kɛ. Sariya koɲɛw lakɔlɔsi kosɛbɛ.

pro.name: Poro
pro.description: Mɔgɔ kelen kelen ni denbayaw ye

procedures.title: Ɲɛmɔgɔya kɛ
